description: '''Jules Shungu Wembadio Pene Kikumba''' {{Post-nominals|country=CD|post-noms=[[Order of the National Heroes Kabila-Lumumba|ONH]]}} (14 June 1949 – 24 April 2016), known professionally as '''Papa Wemba''' ({{IPA|fr|papa wɛmba}}), was a Congolese singer and musician who played [[Congolese rumba]], [[soukous]], and [[ndombolo]]. Dubbed the "King of Rumba Rock", he was one of the most popular musicians of his time in Africa and played an important role in [[world music]]. He was also a fashion icon who popularized the [[La Sape|Sape]] look and style through his musical group [[Viva la Musica]], with whom he performed on stages throughout the world.
